titles.title: A bill to establish aviation accession training programs for the Commissioned Officer Corps of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to prepare students for commissioned service as pilots in the Corps, and for other purposes.

A bill to establish aviation accession training programs for the Commissioned Officer Corps of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to prepare students for commissioned service as pilots in the Corps, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
This bill directs the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) to establish aviation accession training programs for the NOAA Commissioned Officer Corps at certain educational institutions.
The bill sets forth eligibility requirements for the training programs and authorizes NOAA to provide financial assistance to program participants.
